problem_names:
lemma logically_equivalent_eqvt:
    assumes "P =\<cdot> Q" shows "p \<bullet> P =\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q"
translations:
lemma logically_equivalent_eqvt:
    assumes "P =\<cdot> Q" shows "p \<bullet> P =\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P =\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P =\<cdot> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P =\<cdot> p \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x. P \<Turnstile> x = Q \<Turnstile> x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x. p \<bullet> P \<Turnstile> x = p \<bullet> Q \<Turnstile> x
